result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony L Washington

defendant.name: Washington, Anthony L
defendant.address: 1429 W Atkinson Ave Apt 4, Milwaukee, WI 53206

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Anthony L Washington appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Heather L. Johnson appeared by video for Anthony L Washington.  Attorney Owen M Piotrowski appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Discussion placed on the record. Defense requested an adjournment. Court granted request. Court extended the filing deadlines to the next hearing date. Court ordered case adjourned for Final PreTrial and Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Final PreTrial scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference. Jury Trial scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Defendant Anthony L Washington in Court with Attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Anthony L Washington in custody.  Owen M Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.** 
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Discussion placed on the record. Defense counsel requested Final PreTrial and Jury Trial dates. Court ordered parties to submit their Motions in Limine, Jury Instructions, and Witness Lists by the Final PreTrial date. Any Motions are due by the Final PreTrial date. If the parties believe a necessary witness for the State or Defense requires independent representation, they are to make arrangements for that representation through the Public Defender's Office two (2) weeks in advance of the Final PreTrial. Court ordered case adjourned for Final PreTrial and Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. 

Final PreTrial scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 09:45 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference. 
Jury Trial scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Attorney Heather L. Johnson in court, defendant Anthony L Washington not in court, in custody.  Owen M Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.**JUDGE FEISS AND ALL PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Court found the state has satisfied victims' rights law. Motion to modify bail by Defense. State is objecting any modification of bail. Court denies bail motion. Case is adjourned in Branch 46.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Heather L. Johnson in Court, Defendant Anthony L Washington not in Court, in custody.  Owen M Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

HELD OFF THE RECORD VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE. 
Case in Court for Bail/Bond hearing. Clerk previously made arrangements for Defendant to appear via Zoom Video Conference; however, CJF did not produce Defendant via Zoom. Parties selected a new date. Case adjourned for Bail/Bond hearing, Branch 46. Bail/Bond hearing scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 11:30 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Clerk contacted the parties via email to reschedule Bail/Bond hearing.
NEW DATE: Bail/Bond hearing scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference.
Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Anthony L Washington in court with attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Anthony L Washington in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective G. Orozco. Court took Judical Notice to case 20CF153 & 13CF4105.   State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 46. Defense wants to be heard on bail.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Anthony L Washington not in court, defendant in custody.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD to appoint Attorney H. Johnson. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the waiting list.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Anthony L Washington in court with attorney Helmi Hamad.  Defendant Anthony L Washington in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Anthony L Washington appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Feiss, Branch 46. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 4.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Anthony L Washington
Current: 1429 W Atkinson Ave Apt 4, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 04-27-2022)
Prior: 3701 North 5th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53212

Court ordered no contact with TSM, dob 6/11/1992
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
